nodes.text:
Trueping's was a seedy bar located in slum district G17 of the Coruscant Underworld, in the same building as Chezdeze and a massage parlor.
Bounty hunter Rako Hardeen went there to celebrate after "killing" Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, only to be confronted by a still-living Kenobi in the establishment's back room. The Jedi Master had faked his own death and assumed Hardeen's identity to infiltrate a plot to kidnap Supreme Chancellor Sheev Palpatine. Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker and his Padawan, Ahsoka Tano, then arrived at Trueping's and arrested the fake Hardeen, having been informed of his location by Grand Master Yoda.
The name of the bar is a reference to The Clone Wars concept artist Tara Rueping.
